titleStmt.title: John Price et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG5723

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: We of the jury that tried Ernest Davis recommend him to the mercy of the Governor and wish that he may be pardoned --

John Price -- Foreman
W, Hardin
J. H. Myers
Henry Davis
James, M. Grove
James Douglass
Wade F Lane
L. Richardson
W. C. Moore
Wm C Dodge
S. S. Augustus

I James P Chambers clerk of the Jefferson Circuit Court in the state aforesaid, do certify that the foregoing named persons, are the names of the Jury who tried and convicted Ernest Davis of the crime of Larceny, at the May Term of the said Court, for one year.
Witness my hand as clerk aforesaid this 11th day of July 1864
